Posts.Content: Jul 16, 2014 01:36PM Karmen wrote: thank you very much for your response, I found the information very useful. Have no  test results yet :( but i'll post them as soon as I am able to.
Posts.Title: Waiting and anxious Karmen Karmen

Posts.Content: Karmen wrote: I am new here, I had a biopsy yesterday for an area of concern in my right breast. The doctor left a clip on site in case I need surgery, she said. I also have not share the news with my children, siblings, or my mom. You know I had kidney cancer 10 yrs ago and many many scares since then, the most recent was last July with lymphoma cells in my stomach but resolved with treatment.  My children are tired of hearing that I may have cancer. This time I didn't want to worry them but I think my doctor was worried. I need to know if it may be cancer so I can prepare my self and be strong for my children and my mom. The thing they saw in the us was not symmetric, had a shadow, and it measure a little less than 1 centimeter. I had a 3d mammogram, a diagnosis us, and the biopsy with a clip left on site... What do you think? Please be honest. I can handle it! Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Waiting and anxious Karmen Karmen

Posts.Content: Jul 16, 2014 04:50PM Karmen wrote: thank you both for your response. I am waiting for the results. I do have an appt. with my surgeon next Thursday at noon but I asked her to call me when she gets the results. I had my biopsy on Monday and they told me it will take three or four days. So I am hopping tomorrow or Friday. I had a conversation with my husband today as he is also in the process of finding out about a lump that he has. His appt. is on Monday, so we made a pact to be together no matter what. That made a difference it made me stronger. Thank you for your support. I'll keep you posted.
Posts.Title: Waiting and anxious Karmen Karmen

Posts.Content: Jul 17, 2014 09:18AM Karmen wrote: thanks Fightlikeagirl72. Sorry to hear about your biopsy experience. I got the phone call from my doctor's office today. They told me that my biopsy shows no signs of cancer but they need me to have a diagnostic mammogram beforemy follow  up appt  on thursday. Do you guys know why they are sending me for another mammogram any ideas will help
